text: And he said to me, It is a great thing for thee to be called my servant, to establish the tribes of Jacob, and to recover the dispersion of Israel: behold, 49. 6 Acts 13. 47. I have given thee for the 49. 6 Gr. a perpetual covenant.covenant of a race, for a light of the Gentiles, that thou shouldest be for salvation to the end of the earth.
